content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the function of the third paragraph (“For that . . . stories”)?

choices.label: It briefly summarizes the extended arguments about stories made up to this point in the passage.
It provides a transition from the passage’s discussion of metaphors to its discussion of stories.
It draws a conclusion about stories based on evidence presented earlier in the passage.
It challenges a previously introduced claim about metaphors with which the author disagrees.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
